title: Minecrafr正版启动器启动时有文件自动生成
author: poontise
txt_content:
就会有个“nativelog.txt”的文件自动生成，无论我把启动器怎么设置都是那样。
txt内容：
Set run directory to F:\Program Files (x86)\Minecraft
Native Launcher Version: 301
Operating System: Windows 10 Pro
Application Hash: 21880fed62e16988cda4de8d7591a6d2f5078044
Application Data directory: C:\Users\Sun\AppData\Roaming
Executable Path: MinecraftLauncher.exe
App Directory dir: F:\Program Files (x86)\Minecraft
Start dir: F:/Program Files (x86)/Minecraft
Launcher dir: F:/Program Files (x86)/Minecraft/game
TmpDir dir: F:/Program Files (x86)/Minecraft/game
Java Launcher hash: ccb4a2df12fa3bd8c4d27ece46f692d12f91a01b
Java Version: 1.8.0_25
x64: 1
LauncherConfiguration from: https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/launcher.json
Downloaded config
Native launcher is current
Native launcher is current
Java launcher is current: ccb4a2df12fa3bd8c4d27ece46f692d12f91a01b(ccb4a2df12fa3bd8c4d27ece46f692d12f91a01b)
Check to see if we can run the launcher
Native launcher is current
runJavaLauncher
Started application ./runtime/jre-x64/1.8.0_25/bin/java.exe -cp "F:/Program Files (x86)/Minecraft/game/launcher.jar" net.minecraft.launcher.Main --winTen --nativeLauncherVersion 301
Application still running, assuming all's fine.
求怎么不让启动器自动生成此文件

replies.author: kj415j45
replies.txt_content:
这个是启动器的日志，不可能阻止它的生成
而且这个又占不了多少空间
你这样发出来反而暴露了某些东西，比如：
你的系统是win10 pro 64位
系统安装在F盘
用户数据存储在C盘
java版本1.8.0_25
启动器hash值为21880fed62e16988cda4de8d7591a6d2f5078044
java的hash为ccb4a2df12fa3bd8c4d27ece46f692d12f91a01b

replies.author: poontise
replies.txt_content:

而且这个又占不了多少空间
你这样发出来反而暴露了某些东 ...
感谢你的回复，对我有极大的帮助！谢谢你解决了我的顾虑！
